divs: Sighting DetailsCylinder shape object hovering over Bellevue park area. Started around there and headed toward Silver Lake reservoir. 5pm. It was taking a smooth path and looked as if it was transforming or something, giving off the suns light . could have been a balloon, but this was bigger.
Summary: Cylinder shape object hovering over Bellevue park area
